R = Zp(2)
x = R(1,15)
y = R(1,15)
z = R(1,15)
t = R(3,15)
for _ in range(20):
    u = (y*t + z*z) / x
    x,y,z,t = y,z,t,u
    print u

| ...0000011111101

R = ZpL(2)
x = R(1,15)
y = R(1,15)
z = R(1,15)
t = R(3,15)
for _ in range(20):
    u = (y*t + z*z) / x
    x,y,z,t = y,z,t,u
    print u
